summary: This is a brief internal document from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 26, 2019, noting a change in the medication supply (Colace and milk of magnesia) provided to an inmate, specifying a 15-day supply instead of 30 days. The document is marked confidential and appears to be a record related to inmate care.

events.title: Medication supply adjustment for inmate
events.description: A record indicates that an inmate is being given a 15-day supply of Colace and half a bottle of milk of magnesia to self-carry, instead of a 30-day supply and a full bottle.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Document is dated July 26, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It records a medication adjustment for an inmate, reducing a supply of Colace and milk of magnesia from 30 days to 15 days.
The document is marked confidential and is part of the SDNY_00009779 file series.
